it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.socket

Class SocketServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.socket.SocketServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkHandler, ServerInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class SocketServer
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ServerInterface
    This class is the implementation of the MultiThreading SocketServer
    Author:
    Francesco Masciulli
